ARABIC: أُو۟لَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشْتَرَوُا۟ ٱلضَّلَٰلَةَ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ فَمَا رَبِحَت تِّجَٰرَتُهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُهْتَدِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Those are the people who have sold guidance for misguidance. Their trade has brought no profit; they are not guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They are indeed those who bartered away good guidance for error and gained nothing from the deal, nor found the right way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: These are the people who have bartered away Guidance for error, but this is a profitless bargain that they have made, and they are not at all on the right way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They have traded guidance for error, but their bargain has had no profit and they have missed the true guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: These are the people who purchased error in exchange of guidance – so their bargain did not profit them, and they did not know how to trade.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: These are they who have purchased error with guidance, so their commerce was profitless. And they were not guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: These are they who buy error for the right direction, so their bargain shall bring no gain, nor are they the followers of the right direction.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Those are they that have bought error at the price of guidance, and their commerce has not profited them, and they are not right-guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: These are they who purchase error at the price of guidance, so their commerce doth not prosper, neither are they guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Such are those who have taken misguidance in exchange for guidance; but their bargain does not profit them, nor have they found true guidance.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: These are they who purchased error for guidance, but their traffic profited not, nor have they ever become guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They are the ones who bought error for guidance, so their trade did not profit them, nor were they guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: These are they who have bartered Guidance for error: But their traffic is profitless, and they have lost true direction,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: These are they who have purchased error for guidance, so their commerce was profitless. And they were not guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Such are those who barter away guidance for error, their trade did not profit (them), nor are they guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Those are they who have bartered error for guidance; but their trade does not profit them, and they are not guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Those are the ones who have purchased error [in exchange] for guidance, so their transaction has brought no profit, nor were they guided.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:16] Those are they who have bought error for guidance, that is, they have exchanged the latter for the former; so their commerce has not profited them, that is to say, they have gained nothing from it, indeed, they have lost, because their destination is the Fire, made everlasting for them; nor are they guided, in what they did.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (These are they who purchase error at the price of guidance), they chose disbelief instead of faith and exchanged guidance with error, (so their commerce did not prosper), they did not prosper in their bargain but on the contrary (neither were they guided) to overcome their error.
